title: Banana Hit White Nicotine Pouches by Cuba
description: TRY BANANA HIT WHITE NICOTINE POUCHES CUBA Banana Hit White is a premium offering in the world of nicotine pouches, especially for tropical lovers. Experience the sweetness of ripe bananas that tingle your senses, providing a delightful and unique taste experience. CUBA's exotic flavours make this product more than just a regular nicotine pouch. View all Cuba Pouches View all Dessert Pouches View all Fruity Pouches View all Extra Strong Pouches KEY FEATURES: 24MG Per Gram | 15.6MG Per Pouch Fresh banana-flavoured nicotine pouches Refreshing tingling sensation with each pouch Tobacco-free, smoke-free and vapour-free Discreet and suitable for all occasions MORE ABOUT BANANA FLAVOURED NICOTINE POUCHES Cuba Banana Hit White offers the familiar taste of bananas transformed into an exhilaratingly icy sensation for a tropical and revitalizing experience. This pouch is one of the boldest options available, packed with nicotine. MORE ABOUT CUBA NICOTINE POUCHES Cuba is manufactured by Nicotobacco, one of the leading suppliers of nicotine pouches in Poland. Nicotobacco also manufactures Cuba sister brand Baron. Cuba offers a range of mint flavours. Additional Description Information: Brand Name: Cuba Product Type: Nicotine Pouches Pouch Format: Slim Our Strength Rating: Extra Strong Nicotine per Pouch 16 MG Nicotine per Gram 24 MG Flavour Name: Banana Flavour: Fruity Pouches per can: 20 Shipping from: London, UK
